caption.p: Perceived mental healthcare needs among participants during COVID-19 pandemic.

tr.th: Percentage of people who perceive there is a mental health need. (N = 662)

tr.td: Do you think it would be nice to talk to someone about your worries for the COVID 19 viral epidemic?
Do you think it is necessary to get mental health help if one panics in lieu of the Pandemic situation?
Do you think it would be beneficial if mental health professionals help people in dealing with the current COVID19 pandemic situation?
Will you suggest people for obtaining mental health help to people who are highly affected by the COVID19 pandemic?
